attributes.action: Expel D. Lammy from Parliament for proposing the referendum result be ignored.
attributes.background: It was clearly understood that the referendum result be honoured by all. By proposing that a clear result should be ignored contempt is being shown for democracy and the British people. Any MP proposing this is not fit and proper person to be a member of Parliament.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
